PHASE SUMMARY — Edmund Dantes — early

Role: 
- Crew member of the _Pharaon_
- Young man who assists the owner, M. Morrel, in boarding the ship

Traits:
- Resourceful and active, as shown by his ability to climb up the side of the ship
- Willing to help others, as demonstrated by his assistance to M. Morrel
- Possibly honest, as he is unaware of the packet left at Porto-Ferrajo

Relationships:
- M. Morrel: Dantes assists the owner in boarding the ship and is in conversation with him
- Danglars: Dantes is questioned by Danglars about the packet left at Porto-Ferrajo

Notable behaviors:
- Dantes is willing to help others, as shown by his assistance to M. Morrel
- Dantes is unaware of the packet left at Porto-Ferrajo, which suggests he may not be involved in any suspicious activities.
